content.prompt: The speaker’s characterization of herself in the present moment in lines 22-25 (“most . . . month”) and lines 39-40 (“some . . . arrive”) implies that she is

choices.label: spinning in a cycle of despair
managing to cope with her fears

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how a character's own choices, actions, and speech reveal complexities in that character, and explain the function of those complexities.
